record.title: MULTINATIONAL SPECIES CONSERVATION FUNDS REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
MULTINATIONAL SPECIES CONSERVATION FUNDS REAUTHORIZATION ACT OF 2007 -- (Senate - November 16, 2007)

[Page: S14655]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of Calendar No. 322, H.R. 50.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 50) to reauthorize the African Elephant Conservation Act and the Rhinoceros and Tiger Conservation Act of 1994.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the bill be read the third time and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, and that any statements relating thereto be printed in the Record, without further intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The bill (H.R. 50) was ordered to a third reading, was read the third time, and passed.
